page.title: 13SAND PIT, HODDESDON.
page.content: Situated immediately to the west of the Al0 road & north of the site of Broxbournebury School the sand pit owned by the St. Albans Sand & Gravel Company extends to approx. 60 acres. The material excavated is a rough hoggin. Excavation at the present rate, 2 full-time & 2 part-time men are employed there, is expected to continue for a further 4/5 years & the Company do not have plans to extend at present. Nothing of interest, either geologically or historically has been uncovered but the Pit did provide basic material used in l972/3 in the foundations of the adjacent Al0 major road. The excavation of this site means that a valuable amenity becomes available in the form of a land infill and rubbish disposal area.
